Gilthor - Chained Amalgamation

  1. Post WotC: Allied Crossplay
    Gilthor - Chained Amalgamation     [Source: World|Strike FAQ]
    For his alt mode ability, the enemy is not required to take the damage in order to be flipped. For example, where the opponentâ€™s Flamewar is Upgraded with a Holomatter Projector, it can still be flipped by your Gilthor, Chained Amalgamation when Gilthor is flipped to alt mode.
